'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The workshop of Uto, the RDC's finest gunsmith (at least in Neketaka).

==Points of interest==
* Apart from shopping, you can loot the locked chests for firearms.

==Characters==
* [[Uto]], skilled gunsmith.

==Loot==
* [[Dragon's Dowry]], [[Scordeo's Trophy]]: Sold by Uto.

==Gallery==
